projects.name: Sensor snap library
projects.description: Vue library to generate Sensors Widget with Open Mobile Alliance references as inputs.

projects.name: Aloes-handlers library
projects.description: Encode / decode MQTT stream from IoT device to browsers. Using Open Mobile Alliance standards as main target / source protocol.

projects.name: YOGIINMYCITY
projects.description: Creating a web app for Yogi in my City - a social network linking Yoga teachers and studios. In charge of backend / frontend development, and participation in webdesign
projects.tags: NodeJS, Loopback, Vue.js, Socket.io, Stripe, MongoDB, PM2

projects.name: portfolio
projects.description: Taking time to make a retrospective of the past years ... and learning some new web technologies. Working on the frontend and backend, with the intent to create a rich browsing experience.
descMultiLng: Taking time to make a retrospective of the past years ... Working on the frontend and backend, with the intent to create a rich browsing experience.
Prendre le temps de faire une retropspective des dernières années ...
projects.tags: NodeJS, ExpressJS, Webpack, VueJS, D3JS, open source

projects.name: Chatbot education
projects.description: Based on a natural conversation framework, i'm working on an event driven chatbot,  as a welcoming assistant to users ( tutorials interacting with frontend ) and as working tool for us (replace CLI tools / notify important logs) - Aloes

projects.name: Web presentations
projects.description: Building responsive websites to describe product features and call visiter's to the online demo, part of the customer development mission - Exostic

projects.name: IoT platform
projects.description: Designing a web platform for professionals with Exostic, aiming to simplify devices and softwares interoperability. Analyzing BI & IoT market, building prototypes, interviewing testers, launch MVP's, test on field, iterate ...
projects.tags: IoT, Dataviz, UX design, React, JSON, low code

projects.name: IS admin
projects.description: Setting up and maintaining a remote working environment including chat, cloud, kanban solution, to fight against chaos and amnesia. -  Exostic
projects.tags: Project management, Nginx, LetsEncrypt, Nextcloud, Wekan, Linux

projects.name: Cosmonode board
projects.description: Inspired by many open hardware boards existing, but not finding what was exactly needed for customers testing phase, i built a multipurpose board to ease IoT experiments on the field, associated with a set of shield extensions to adapt complex sensors circuit.
projects.tags: open hardware, PCB, Kicad, MVP, Lora

projects.name: Greenspace study
projects.description: Collaboration on a global design project in offices at Nantes, including green installations like floatting lianas, indoor farming systems, 3D printed pots. Thinking of tomorrow's workspaces with Katra - Chessé

projects.name: Web app prototype
projects.description: Once all those devices were left in the nature, i made my first steps into web development, to make sense of those harvested data and to operate devices remotely.
projects.tags: Node-red, InfluxDB, Grafana, Raspberry pi, PoC

projects.name: DIY Gateway
projects.description: After doing some measurements locally, it was time to access services remotely. So, based on several open source bricks, i developped a gateway firmware to forward nodes (+ sensors) comunication to the web
projects.tags: ESP8266, C++, MySensors, MQTT, open source

projects.name: Biodiag
projects.description: Landscaping work make you understand this, every gardener has many common questions in mind and that's how the next concept was born, to bring a solution to assist / automate gardening actions based on environmental conditions monitoring, and the prototype would be an hardware solution.

projects.name: DIY club
projects.description: For a year, i hosted a a weekly meeting of amateur coders to help each other and progress faster in our own projects. Together we built some DIY domotic system, mini WiFi camera, 3D printers, flowerpots, toys, ...

projects.name: Plants have conversations
projects.description: Studying the ways to catch, classify, and interprete plants signals. It goes from plant's conductivity monitoring, to their inner energy measurement ( MFC ) and others more or less scientifical methods. - Personal project

projects.name: Art exhibition
projects.description: Exhibition introducing two creations, we wished to expose plants as subjects of questionning in an unusual context for them : could they also be part of an artistic composition, like paintings or photographs, or would they be too dynamic for this ? - Promenarts gallery
projects.tags: nature, arts, Ile de ré, craft

projects.name: Vegetal column prototypes
projects.description: After several years observing plant's producing methods ( vegetables, horticulture ), i went on speculating how working conditions, and ROI could be increased, when keeping in mind technics involving verticality and 360%, and did a simple prototype based on green wall technics, which was rather successful. Commercialized by Tootem.

projects.name: Publication
projects.description: Vegetal installation in a nice residence hidden in La Rochelle, intended to create collaboration between wilderness and domestic spaces - Habitat magazine
projects.tags: design temple, luxury spot, japanese garden

projects.name: Greenspace study
projects.description: Assisting landscape team to design vegetal installations, greeting the public. This project was related to the opening of the greenhouses - La Rochelle

projects.name: IVI
projects.description: Created a company to offer my skills on design and installation of innovative plants support. I attempted to give plants more attention by building unusual nests, playing with physical boundaries and bring a different view of landscaping.

projects.name: Green wall experimentations
projects.description: Having great interests in hydroponics for several years, it was a challenge just to think of growing vertically, it implied to conceive an irrigation system, a structure with a special substrate, which are sustainable, and finally plant's selection/implantation had to consider many environmental aspects.

projects.name: Online store
projects.description: Participation in starting an online grow shop (drop shipping - retail store), focusing on customers paying extra attention to reactive delivery service, blog articles quality, selected practical advises, and chat assistance.  - Home Garden Labs
